document_data.name: Jamal
document_data.mainbody: '''Jamal the Thespian''' was a [[bard]], as well as a member of the [[Harpers]], who lived in [[Westgate]] ''circa'' the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. She was a champion of the poor and downtrodden. She lived on [[South Ssemm Spur]].
document_data.Relationships: Jamal was a strong ally of Lady [[Thistle Thavalar]] in her battle for more democracy in Westgate.
document_data.History:
Jamal was once an [[adventurer]] and joined the Harpers because of [[Finder Wyvernspur]] before he became a [[deity]]. She retired from adventuring sometime before the {{YearlinkName|1350}}, when she grew too old for the lifestyle.

Later, she directed a group of streets actors who performed around Westgate for poor people.
